notesStmt.note: Recto has 6 diagonal lines (one word each) of marginal postscript; exceeding words cramped between lines. Verso bears only the addresses, in Arabic characters; The writer is addressing his mother in Alexandria. He asks about her health, informs her that he has divorced his wife, and request that she be kind to the carrier of this letter, who comes from Iraq.
Condition: stained in right edge; in mail format; marginalia on recto, address on verso.
